EmailTemplate.name: Email Template for Sending Surveys
EmailTemplate.subject: Happy with resolution for case #{!Case.CaseNumber}? | Let us know how you feel
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
We would be grateful if you could spare 2 mins to answer a short survey and let us know how was your experience with us for your issue #{!Case.CaseNumber}.
Customer Survey - {!Case.InvitationLink__c}
* The link will be active till 3 days. * The information gathered will be used for quality assurance only. * We value your privacy and do not sell personal information to third parties.
We appreciate your time and feedback and assure you of our best services. Thank you
